data_table.description: Death Certificate Form, DTH. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: DTHA18A
variable.description: Death Eligibility Check Section. Did this person die in-hospital? dthf18a [Death Certificate Form]

variable.name: DTHA18B
variable.description: Death Eligibility Check Section.Time of death. dthf18b CHD event on HLIST [Death Certificate Form]

variable.name: DTHA03A
variable.description: A. Information from Death Index/Certificate. Death Eligibility Check Section. Is decedent's place of residence at time of death available Q3A [Death Certificate Form]

variable.description: A. Information from Death Index/Certificate. MARITAL STATUS Q7 [Death Certificate Form]
